name: Bouncedown
description:
How long can you bounce in this insanely addictive arcade game?

The #1 overall FREE game in more than 25 countries, Jagex Games Studio brings the hugely popular PC game BounceDown to the iPhone™ and iPod® Touch.

How long can you survive the never-ending conveyor belt of platforms that rise from the furnace below to the spikes above without coming to a miserable end? As the scores get higher, the game gets more manic, turning into an adrenalin fueled, reaction burning, fun fest to test your skills to their limits.

=======

Features

• Completely free game
• Simple to play but tough to master
• Hyper-addictive gameplay
• Boast about your Bounce Down skills to the world with Facebook integration
• Suitable for anyone with super quick reactions
• OpenFeint Integration

=======

Controls

• Touch – touch left or right to move your splat
• Track – move your finger around the screen and let the splat follow
• Tilt – tilting your device left or right to slide your splat

=======

Also available from Jagex Game Studio:

Miner Disturbance - can you dig it?
StarCannon - hours of shoot 'em up fun!

Visit us at www.jagex.com!
